Ludwig van Beethoven

Sonata no. 21 in C major, op. 53 (Waldstein)

1804 · Biamonti 411

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 26'

  • 1. Allegro con brio
  • 2. Introduzione: Adagio molto
  • 3. Rondo: Allegretto moderato – Prestissimo

1. Allegro con brio

Duration: 11'

Difficulty: 4

2. Introduzione: Adagio molto

The original slow movement of the sonata was the andante in F major (WoO 57). Its replacement, an introduzione, leads into the rondo without pause.

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

3. Rondo: Allegretto moderato – Prestissimo

Duration: 10' 30"

Difficulty: 4.5
